string-array.name: mbbms_description_text
string-array.item: Processing error. Please try again later.(001)
Package information errors. Please update the service guide and try again.(003)
The server is busy. Please try again later.(007)
Processing error. Please consult mobile phone manufacturer.(008)
The package has not been subscribed. Please update subscription table.(010)
No permission to subscribe the package. Please consult the operator for detail information.(011)
Processing error. Please try again later.(015)
The request has been processed. Please wait.(016)
Processing error. Please consult the operator.(022)
Processing error. Please try again later.(024)
Fail to subscribe the package since it is included in another package that had been subscribed.(027)
The area you are located does not support mobile TV service.(028)
The package has been subscribed. Please update the subscription table. (029)
The package can not be subscribed due to money is not enough.(131)
The channel list and content list can not be updated due to weak signal. Please try again later.(2001)
Can not connect to the mobile network. Please check the network settings.(2201)
Fail to update subscription table. Please try again later.(2202)
Connection timeout. Please try again later.(2203)
Processing error. Please try again later.(2204)
File parsing error. Please try again later.(4101)
Bad program frequency. Please try again later.(4102)
Bad network parameter. Please try again later.(4103)
Processing error. Please try again later.(4104)
Bad user name. Please try again later.(5201)
Authentication failed. Please try again later.(5202)
